common.allowTeleportComment: Allows a player to teleport to a located structure when in creative mode, opped, or in cheat mode.
common.displayCoordinatesComment: Allows players to view the precise coordinates and distance of a located structure on the HUD, rather than relying on the direction the compass is pointing.
common.maxRadiusComment: The maximum radius that will be searched for a structure. Raising this value will increase search accuracy but will potentially make the process more resource intensive.
common.maxSamplesComment: The maximum number of samples to be taken when searching for a structure.
common.structureBlacklistComment: A list of structures that the compass will not display in the GUI and will not be able to search for. The wildcard character * can be used to match any number of characters, and ? can be used to match one character. Ex (ignore backslashes): ["minecraft:stronghold", "minecraft:endcity", "minecraft:*village*"]

client.displayWithChatOpenComment: Displays compass information even while chat is open.
client.translateStructureNamesComment: Attempts to translate structure names before fixing the unlocalized names. Translations may not be available for all structures.
client.overlayLineOffsetComment: The line offset for information rendered on the HUD.
client.overlaySideComment: The side for information rendered on the HUD. Ex: LEFT, RIGHT
